lines.text:
[after seeing a routine of figure skaters, the teachers hear a drum beating quietly and turn in its direction]
Stop it immediately, an exam is in progress!
[the drum keeps beating and everyone turns there again. The teacher walks there]
[she looks up to see Lyudmila crying. It was her tears that beat the drum]
I dreamt so much, so much, but...!
When will you finally understand art is merciless? We will enroll students again in autumn... well... erm... and then, well, perhaps... Lida!
How long have you been skating?
